org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.gridworldeditor.model

Class GridCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.gridworldeditor.model.GridCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GridCell
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A single Cell of the GridModel. Contains the rewards of a state. Optionally obstacles.
    See Also:
